headline: Will Manufacturing Expansion Amid Rising Demand Change RTX's (RTX) Investment Narrative?
summary: In recent days, RTX emerged as a vital player as higher global defense spending and surging commercial air travel led to a growing order backlog. Management responded by expanding manufacturing capacity, highlighting confidence in ongoing demand for both defense and commercial aerospace solutions. Against this backdrop, we'll explore how RTX's manufacturing expansion in response to supply-demand pressures may influence its broader investment narrative. These 12 companies survived and thrived...
